tool.name: Filter VCF
tool.command:
python $__tool_directory__/vcf_filter.py
--vcf $input --out-format $out_format --out $output --overwrite
#if $gt.biallelic == 'True': --filter-only-biallelic #else: #if $gt.countProp.gt_filter_type == 'allele_ct': --filter-min-alleles $gt.countProp.filter_min_alleles --filter-max-alleles $gt.countProp.filter_max_alleles #end if #if $gt.countProp.gt_filter_type == 'maf_prop' --filter-maf-min $gt.filter_maf_min --filter-maf-max $gt.filter_maf_max #end if
#if $gt.countProp.gt_filter_type == 'mac_int' --filter-mac-min $gt.filter_mac_min --filter-mac-max $gt.filter_mac_max #end if #end if
#if $gt.indels --filter-include-indels #end if #if $gt.indels == 'False' --filter-exclude-indels #end if
#if $snp.filter_include_snps #set include_snps = [include_snp.strip() for include_snp in str($snp.filter_include_snps).split(",")] --filter-include-snp $include_snps #end if #if $snp.filter_exclude_snps #set exclude_snps = [exclude_snp.strip() for exclude_snp in str($snp.filter_exclude_snps).split(",")] --filter-exclude-snp $exclude_snps #end if
#if $snp.filter_include_snp_file --filter-include-snp-file $snp.filter_include_snp_file #end if #if $snp.filter_exclude_snp_file --filter-exclude-snp-file $snp.filter_exclude_snp_file #end if
#if $snp.filter_max_missing --filter-max-missing $snp.filter_max_missing #end if
#if $ind.assign_type == 'model_file' #if $ind.model_file and $ind.model --model-file $ind.model_file --model $ind.model #end if #end if
#if $ind.assign_type == 'indv_data' #if $ind.filter_include_indv #set include_indvs = [include_indv.strip() for include_indv in str($ind.filter_include_indv).split(",")] --filter-include-indv $include_indvs #end if #if $ind.filter_exclude_indv #set exclude_indvs = [exclude_indv.strip() for exclude_indv in str($ind.filter_exclude_indv).split(",")] --filter-exclude-indv $exclude_indvs #end if #if $ind_file.filter_include_indv_file --filter-include-indv-file $ind_file.filter_include_indv_file #end if #if $ind_file.filter_exclude_indv_file --filter-exclude-indv-file $ind_file.filter_exclude_indv_file #end if #end if
#if $pos.filter_include_pos #set include_pos = [include_pos.strip() for include_pos in str($pos.filter_include_pos).split(',')] --filter-include-pos include_pos #end if #if $pos.filter_exclude_pos #set exclude_pos = [exclude_pos.strip() for exclude_pos in str($pos.filter_exclude_pos).split(',')] --filter-exclude-pos exclude_pos #end if
#if $pos.filter_include_positions --filter-include-pos-file $pos.filter_include_positions #end if
#if $pos.filter_exclude_positions --filter-exclude-pos-file $pos.filter_exclude_positions #end if
#if $pos.filter_include_bed --filter-include-bed $pos.filter_include_bed #end if
#if $pos.filter_exclude_bed --filter-exclude-bed $pos.filter_exclude_bed #end if
#if $flag.filter_include_pass --filter-include-passed #end if
#if $flag.filter_exclude_pass --filter-exclude-passed #end if

param.name: biallelic
param.label: Include only sites that are biallelic

param.name: gt_filter_type
param.label: Filter by Allele Count, MAF proportion, MAC values

param.name: filter_min_alleles
param.label: Minimum alleles
param.help: Include only sites with a greater than or equal number of alleles

param.name: filter_max_alleles
param.label: Maximum alleles
param.help: Include only sites with a lesser than or equal number of alleles

param.name: filter_maf_min
param.label: Minimum MAF Value
param.help: Include only sites with a greater than or equal MAF values

param.name: filter_maf_max
param.label: Maximum MAF Value
param.help: Include only sites with a lesser than or equal MAF values

param.name: filter_mac_min
param.label: Minimum MAC Value
param.help: Include only sites with a greater than or equal MAC values

param.name: filter_mac_max
param.label: Maximum MAC Value
param.help: Include only sites with a lesser than or equal MAC values

param.name: indels
param.label: Include INDELS
param.help: Include a site if they include an insertion or deletion. False will exclude these sites

param.name: snps
param.label: Include SNPS
param.help: Include a site if they contain a SNP. False will exclude these sites

param.name: filter_include_snps
param.label: SNP IDs to include
param.help: Argument used to include SNP(s) with the matching ID, i.e. rs####. Comma seperate multiple entries.

param.name: filter_exclude_snps
param.label: SNP IDs to exclude
param.help: Argument used to exclude SNP(s) with the matching ID, i.e. rs####. Comma seperate multiple entries.

param.name: filter_include_snp_file
param.label: Include SNP File
param.help: File of SNP IDs to include

param.name: filter_exclude_snp_file
param.label: Exclude SNP File
param.help: File of SNP IDs to include

param.name: filter_max_missing
param.label: Max Missing Proportion
param.help: Exclude sites by the proportion of missing data. 0.0 include all missing data, 1.0 excludes all missing data

section.name: pos
section.title: Position Filters
section.help: Filters that include/exclude sites due on their chromosome and/or position

param.name: filter_include_pos
param.label: Chromosome or Positions to include
param.help: May be used to include: an entire chromosome (i.e. chr); a single position (i.e. chr:pos); a chromosomal locus (i.e. chr:start-end); or a chromosomal span (i.e. chr:start-/chr:0-end). Comma seperate multiple entries.

param.name: filter_exclude_pos
param.label: Chromosome or Positions to exclude
param.help: May be used to exclude: an entire chromosome (i.e. chr); a single position (i.e. chr:pos); a chromosomal locus (i.e. chr:start-end); or a chromosomal span (i.e. chr:start-/chr:0-end). Comma seperate multiple entries.

param.name: filter_include_positions
param.label: Include Positions File
param.help: Tab-seperated file of chromosomes and positions

param.name: filter_exclude_positions
param.label: Exclude Positions File
param.help: Tab-seperated file of chromosomes and positions

param.name: filter_include_pass
param.label: Include only sites with the filter flag 'PASS'

param.name: filter_exclude_pass
param.label: Exclude sites with the filter flag 'PASS'
